If agents are buying/selling for humans, you need agent-optimized discovery. | **Your Digital Twin Proxy:** The end of traditional publicity. Your agent (like Neo) needs to represent you in human-hostile, bot-only spaces to stay competitive. |

Don't just talk; build and visualize in the chat. |

Enterprise benefit: Data privacy and direct hardware level task execution. | **The Zero-Friction 1:1 Coach:** Desktop agents mean your coach isn't just a tab—it's part of your OS. How to use local agents to automate the "grunt work" of building your dreams. |
